managementResponses.response:
Andrea, so when I ask you to let us know your stay avoiding any wear for you.
We hope to get them soon again for us to change that impression.

review.title: Ok Hotel for one night
review.reviewText: I had picked the hotel as part of a bundle and paid for one person, at arrival I paid extra be assure there was two of us, yet we didn't get a bigger room or a second towel or extra soap. Not sure what I paid for at the hotel. I stayed there one night so it didn't matter but won't recommend it for a long stay

managementResponses.response:
Thanks for your opinion is very important to improve , hopefully gets them again soon.

graciously

review.title: Economy Hotel - Area is Questionable
review.reviewText:
This hotel is located in an area that appears to be a little on the 'rough' side.  The building and its features are fairly dated and could use updating/freshening-up/maintenance.  There is a restaurant immediately in front of the hotel which does make it convenient for meals.

The hotel was competitively priced at time of booking  but having stayed there, I think I would have paid more to be in a better area and in a slightly more up-to-date hotel.  

Not all  staff spoke English, but they were all very pleasant and helpful on all accounts.  One gentleman did speak English and he, like his colleagues, was extremely helpful and pleasant to deal with.  The staff is this hotel's top feature and they receive top marks from me.
review.positiveRemarks: Price was good at time of booking but check around in case better properties are equally or more competitive.  Staff were very helpful and pleasant.
review.negativeRemarks: The hotel's equipment is extremely dated.
review.locationRemarks: All my friends residing in Sao Paulo warned me that the area was not good and that I should be careful. I can confirm that the area seemed very rough.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate your opinion and we are working to better serve them .

review.reviewText: It was in a just ok area for us..the hotel is nothing special and the breakfast needs some help.

managementResponses.response: muito obrigada esperamos recebe-lo novamente em breve

review.title: okay
review.reviewText: very near to the cheap airport bus shuttle republica
